categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: The 94th Fighter/Attack Squadron was a T-65 X-wing starfighter squadron in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Under the command of the Duros Kip Famas, the 94th was based out of Polis Massa Research Base while the Galactic Empire was conducting tests of the experimental TIE/ph phantom starfighter in the surrounding region. Along with the BTL Y-wing starfighters of the 88th Attack Squadron, the 94th was tasked with eliminating the Imperial threat. The squadron lost at least four X-wings, but the Imperials were eventually forced to abandon the tests and withdraw from the area.
